Embedded_text:
Well we’ve hit 1,000 Followers 

Or I should I say 1,000 new friends.  

Massive thanks to everyone so far. 

When I started 7 weeks ago this felt impossible. 

I started with ZERO social media experience. 

What I’ve learnt...

 Celebration Thread

Get a coach or mentor. 

That’s it. Nothing more to add.

You don’t need a college education to make great money.

You need skills.

When building your circle...

Think quality over quantity.

You don’t need great ideas to be successful.

You need to copy what works.
The more money you have, the less you care about impressing people with how much money you have.

A true sign of leadership isn’t how many followers you have. 

It’s how many leaders you’ve developed.

Seriously, how can you not love capitalism?

It’s a simple system where you create something of value and you get rewarded. 

Why do people want things for free?
If you lack motivation it generally means you are working on someone else’s goals rather than your own.
Your own personal growth will happen a lot faster when you focus less on others and more on yourself.

Speaking is overvalued.

Listening is undervalued. 

Agree?
Put systems in place so you need to make less decisions.

How to separate yourself from 99% of people. 

Finish what you start.

#1 Negotiation Tip

Know when to shutup.

Don’t confuse activity 

With productivity.

Must Reads for Entrepreneurs  

Books are a Superfood for the  

These are the 5 must reads books for future millionaires. 

 Short Thread

A large part of success

Is avoiding doing dumb shit.

The longer term your thinking 

The better your decision making.

How to fail at life

1) Worry about the future.
2) Worry about the past.

Tips for Young Entrepreneurs

- Be patient
- Learn to sell
- Get a mentor
- Stick to one thing
- Get a good accountant
- Structure things properly from the start
- Separate personal and business finances
- Learn basic accounting (P&L, Balance Sheet)

- The poor think about their next meal
- The lower class think paycheck to paycheck
- The middle class think month to month
- The upper class think year to year
- The rich think in decades 
- The wealthy think generationally

Stop thinking short term.
To grow, study winners.
To boost your income, lose your ego.
To win at life, study winners.
To be wealthy, don’t chase money.

Aim to be consistent 

Not perfect.

Stop trying to come up with great ideas. 

Start copying what works.

Remember...

Hard work is the shortcut.

Remember

Being busy isn’t your goal.

Nobody is coming to save you. 

Might need to suck it up and save yourself.

THREAD: 11 Business Lessons for Budding Entrepreneurs

For anyone looking to escape the rat race:

12 Reasons why you’ll crush it financially in 2021

// THREAD //

Stop looking for an easy way 

Start looking for the right way.

How to separate yourself from 99% of people. 

Do what you say you’re going to do.

Education shouldn’t stop when school finishes.

It’s where it should start.

How to know when you’re happy

1. You sleep well at night

2. You’re excited about tomorrow.

Life Tip

When struggling with a decision..

Imagine someone in the same situation asking you for advice.

The average person spends more time planning their weekend 

Than their life’s finances.
To grow, lose your ego.
Underpromise. Overdeliver.
Starting is common. Finishing is rare.
Ideas are not businesses.

#1 Tip for Negotiations.

Speak less, listen more.

How to Win at the Game of Life

1. Hang with Optimists. 

2. Avoid Pessimists.

Don’t waste your 2021

By spending time with people busy wasting their 2021.

Stop being realistic. 

It’s goes hand in hand with being average.

Stop telling people what you’re going to do. 

And start doing it.

Stop taking life advice

From people who aren’t where you want to be in life.

Want to separate yourself from 99% of people? 

When you start something, finish it.

People who tell you that you can’t do something 

Are saying it for them, not you.

You don’t need to be first. 

But you do need to be better.

How to Win at Life.

Hang with Winners.

Results do the real talking. 

Everything else is just noise.

Want to separate yourself from 99% of people? 

Think solutions. Not problems.

WARNING: Capitalism is flawed...

It only works when you do.

You determine your income, not your boss. 

They just pay your wage.

Anytime you ever feel like giving up

Think about who might be watching you.

The capitalist system is rigged. 

Rigged against people who don’t provide any value.

Make difficult decisions today 

So you get to make easy ones tomorrow.

Idiot Proof Success System 

1. Plan 
2. Start on plan
3. Make mistakes 
4. Learn from mistakes 
5. Do new plan
6. Restart
7. Repeat
8. Win

The quicker you find the things that don’t work,

The quicker you’ll find the ones that do.

50 Must Read Books  

Below are some of my favorites from 
- Finance
- Investing 
- Business
- Personal Development

Not a complete list by any means. 

But if you’re looking for a book, a good place to start.

How to separate yourself from 99% of people. 

1. Start something. 
2. Finish it.

Being realistic is for the mediocre. 

Think big. Win big.
Don’t share your big goals with those with small minds.

School is designed for the sheep. 

Life is designed for the wolves.

How to Win at the Game of Life

Separate your emotions from your decisions.
Everybody wants success until they need to give up something to get it.

How to fail at life

1. Regret the past
2. Worry about the future
3. Complain about the present

Ideas are great. 

Action is better.

Tips for Negotiations 

1. Talk Less
2. Listen more
3. Always be willing to walk away
4. Remember the ‘deal of a lifetime’ comes along every other week

The secret to an enjoyable life? 

Spend time with people who enjoy life.

#1 Tip for being more Likable

Talk less about yourself.
The pain of failure fades quicker than the pain of regret.

Life Hack

1. Double down on what’s working
2. Cut back on what isn’t

Take emotion out of your decisions. 

Make better decisions.

By trying to avoid failure

You’re actually avoiding success.

Find yourself a mentor or coach. 

ASAP

How to Lose at the Game of Life

1. Spend time with negative people
2. Listen to their opinions 
3. Believe what they say
4. Act on their advice

Sorry. Game over.

Simple Life Plan

1. Work your arse off
2. Make a pile of cash
3. Limit your expenses
4. Invest in growth assets
5. Convert assets to cashflow 
6. Happily sail off into the sunset

The words that you say to yourself 

Are destroying your confidence more than any enemy ever will.

People who think they are unlucky always seem to find bad luck. 

People who think they’re lucky always seem to find good luck. 

Lesson in there.

Money

You’re happy to trade 40 hours of your life every week for it. 

But can’t spend a couple of hours learning more about it? 

Work smarter, not harder.

Twitter is the greatest networking resource of all time.

- Choose a niche
- Follow experts in that niche
- Be a sponge, study all you can
- Create value, support
- Reach out with questions
- Don’t ask to be mentored. It’s cringe.

The right ones will help.

The day you realise that the only person you are competing with

Is the person you could one day become. 

Is the day your whole life changes.

People spend so much time and energy,

1. Regretting the past
2. Worrying about the future 

That they don’t have the time or energy to embrace the present.

Your desire for perfection leads to procrastination. 

It’s supposed to be messy at the start.

Keys to scaling any business

Learn to;
- eliminate 
- delegate
- automate 
- outsource

So you can focus on what grows your bottom line.

Finding new customers.
Keep your big goals away from small minds.

Top Tips for Negotiations

1. Listen more

2. Speak less

Stop starting new things. 

Start finishing old ones.

Secret to being respected..

Be a person of your word.

Want to separate yourself from 99% of people? 

Finish what you start.

Build your network. 

It will open more doors than a degree ever will.
Stop taking advice from people whose life you don’t aspire to.

If you are living life without a coach or mentor..

You’re living life in the slow lane .

Failure hurts. 

Regret will hurt more.
Education starts after school finishes.

Life isn’t short.

It just feels short if you waste it doing dumb shit.
Your personal income will never outpace your self education.
Surround yourself with people who are excited by your success.

A little preparation is wise. 

Too much is just procrastination.

Don’t let your mindset be determined by your bank balance. 

Let your bank balance be determined by your mindset.

Think logic over emotion
Think systems over skills
Think investing over spending
Think hard work over shortcuts
Think production over consumption

Think success over mediocrity.

To earn passive income 

You first need to leverage your active income.
If you are living on one income stream you have zero respect for your family.

Security comes from a belief in your own skills and experience.

Not from a job.

Avoid people who encourage you to play it safe. 

Life is about taking calculated risks.

The more money you have

The less you care about impressing people with how much money you have.

Stop trying to impress people with your words. 

Start trying to impress people with your actions.

Winners - do what is required, regardless of how they feel. 

Losers - do as they feel, regardless of what is required.

It’s not your boss’s fault that you’re broke.

It’s your habits. 

Stop spending more than you make.

Top tip for being more likable..

Listen more.

Think bigger..

- The poor think about their next meal
- The lower class think paycheck to paycheck
- The middle class think month to month
- The upper class think year to year
- The rich think in decades 
- The wealthy think generationally

Even the most confident people you know..

Sometimes wonder if they’re on the right track.
Avoid any shortcut that challenges your principles.

Starting a business is like going back to school..

Except you learn useful stuff.
If you want to grow, study winners.
Protect your big goals from small minded people.
Stop taking advice from people whose life you’re not inspired by.

How to be in the top 1% ;

1. Start Something

2. Finish it. 

Most people rarely do either.
When you win in life, no one cares how many losses you took to get there.

Jeff Bezos famously once said;

‘Entrepreneurship is more about a state of mind, than working for yourself. 

It’s about being resourceful. It’s about problem solving.’

Stop looking for ideas, start solving problems.

Pro Tip

You’ll separate yourself from 99% of people simply by finishing what you start.

Why you are not meant to be an entrepreneur

3 truths about entrepreneurship that no one tells you 

- Thread -

9 Tips To Being Exceptional

- Avoid gossip
- Focus on you
- Avoid multi-tasking
- Find some mentorship
- Remember shit happens
- Be an expert at one thing
- Learn to play the long game
- Don’t quit when things get hard
- Don’t spend time with small thinkers

What else?
Learning as you go > textbooks.

Your vision needs to be so clear..

That you don’t get excited when you achieve your goals. 

Because you’ve already seen them achieved in your head a thousand times.
Your own personal growth will happen a lot faster when you focus less on others and more on yourself.
Growth starts where your ego stops.

Multitask to be busy.

Focus to be productive.

Nobody remembers those who fit in. 

Be unique. Be you.
Entrepreneurship is the ultimate independence.

You can have everything that you want in life, you just can’t have it all now. 

Be patient.

- Be patient
- Get a mentor
- Stick to one thing
- Learn to market/sell

A great one shows them.

Self education has the highest ROI of any activity on the planet.

Keep working on yourself.

Don’t start a business solely to make money. It’s backwards thinking. 

Help people, solve problems. 

The money will come.

Don’t confuse activity 

With productivity.
The number 1 focus for your income should be to generate more income.

‘A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person.

Being punctual.

Tips for Negotiations 

1. Say Less
2. Listen more

Keep going.

When you win in life, nobody gives a shit how many losses you took to get there.

Learn Sales

 Focus on solving problems.

Scaling for profit.

- Stop fearing failure

Just start.

The longer you keep telling yourself that success is about luck

The longer you will live your life complaining about what you don’t have.

The secret to enjoying life

Is to spend more time with people who enjoy life.

If you think you’re unlucky you’ll always find bad luck. 

If you think you’re lucky you’ll always find good luck. 

There is a lesson in there.

If you fail to take responsibility for your own situation

Your situation will never change.

To succeed, you just learnt to quit. 

- quit small mindedness
- quit procrastination
- quit blaming others
- quit negativity

Quit bad habits to start new ones.
